long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bring all the interesting, useful, or relevant information about anything you see on the Internet straight to you with just one click. Adds ultralinks to every page you go to on the Internet. Now when you want to know about something on the page you are reading about just click on it; immediately a related image and the authoritative links are presented.
